highLegibilityFont.title: High legibility font
highLegibilityFont.desc: Use an high legibility font instead of the standard device font

useMaterialTheming.title: Material Design theming
useMaterialTheming.desc: Theme your experience according to Material guidelines (could cause eye strain)

disableMemberCoversInList.title: Disable member covers in list
disableMemberCoversInList.desc: If enabled, members in the main list will also display in a more compact way
